name: A crossroad of History
description: For those who love the combination of history and culture, Thessaloniki offers a majestic variety of monuments and relics of its turbulent past. It has a plethora of Roman, Byzantine and Ottoman sites and many of its structures are listed in the Unesco World Heritage list. I would like to offer you a beautiful experience that will involve tour guiding along sightseeing and we will explore the hidden treasures of the city, including delicious and authentic Greek cuisine.
